mapper.select: select * from mishu_write.tb_vip_fee_standard where (channel='common' or channel=#{channel}) and state=true

select a.v_id,a.created,a.settings_code,s.desc,s.vip_days from mishu_write.tb_vip_profits a left join mishu_write.tb_vip_profit_settings s on a.settings_code=s.settings_code where v_id=(select v_id from mishu_write.tb_vip_info where user_id=#{userId})

select sum(vip_days) from mishu_write.tb_vip_profits a left join mishu_write.tb_vip_profit_settings s on a.settings_code=s.settings_code where v_id=(select v_id from mishu_write.tb_vip_info where user_id=#{userId})
